title: Happy Tree Friends Font ID
content:
Hi:

I know you'll know this fonts... At least I hope so...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HappyTreeFriends1_4360.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HappyTreeFriends2_5876.jpg)

I'll be around!!

Thanks in advance...

Q™ says: It's all about the fonts!!
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content: Hola Hector, "Happy Tree Friends" se ve hecho a mano, todas las letras son diferentes y "Lumpy" es [CountryHouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220207/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=188&subpage=lettersetter).

Hey!

Gracias Plumbago!, con esa me conformo...

Gracias!!

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!

Bitstream's [Kooky](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/kooky-bt/) is similar to the Happy Tree Friends lettering.

- Mike Yanega

Hey!

Thanks for the input Mike, I'll try that one...

Anyway, the project went well, thanks to all...

Greets!

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
